review: Very cool!!! When traveling in hotels on vacation or whatever it is so cool to be able to plug in the stick and have all your previously purchased Amazon movies available to watch. Prime members can get free shows or movies or you can purchase/rent new ones. Just need a wifi signal for it to work. No brainer. Buy it. We take it with us on vacation for the kids to watch movies on nights when we are not going out and for the Travel sports weekends we spend at various hotels.
